item.description:
(Negation Hearts) I could not call it (Cancellation Hearts) due to some may glance at the heading and think the meetup was canceled!

 

It is played just like the Hearts game on most computers, except with two decks and any two exact cards cancel out and the next highest collects the played cards.

"We use "deal" all cards and last card is not played if everyone does not have a card.
They go in the dead pile with (no high card) rounds."

To keep the game sociable people can come in and out of the game at the MEDIAN of points.

This is only the third time we have played and are still tweaking our (HOME) rules to make the game as sociable as possible.


At DAMATAS

New players welcome, we will teach you how to play.
Do not be discouraged enough not to sign up on the waiting list, if full.

There is no charge for this meetup, however it is suggested that you get a drink or something else there.

Pizzas are $2.99 on Monday nights.


There is now a modest membership fee of $2.00 quarterly. the fee is for the whole group not just Kitty Whist.

You will see "How to pay: Pay online or by cash or check" and " Pay online " on the home page of the group.
If you are a Kitty Whist/Hearts player please mention that you are a Kitty Whist/Hearts player, when you pay.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be the one with the decks of cards.

group.name: The Salem Board Games Meetup Group

item.name: Negation Hearts at DAMATAS in Salem
